name: SINM Scroll To Top
author: SINM

sections.description: This is First sinm simple scroll to top plugin. When visitor scroll bottom then show a simple scroll up arrow button and click to get top to the page.SINM Scroll To Top Demo Here http://wordcorepress.com/plugins/sinm-scroll-to-top/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Demo Here that how to use- http://wordcorepress.com/plugins/sinm-scroll-to-top/

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

For basic usage:

 Install the plugin 
 Enjoy
sections.faq: You can ask any kind of question about my plugin.
